articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as New Zealand play Afghanistan in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: New Zealand v Afghanistan - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday's international action, which saw England clinch a place at the 2024 European Championship, and all the latest football news.
articles.title: England reach Euros, NI & Scotland lose - reaction

articles.description: England defender Harry Maguire says supporters who booed midfielder Jordan Henderson against Australia and Italy "aren't England fans".
articles.title: Proper England fans don't boo players - Maguire

articles.description: Danny Care is preparing for a "hell of a test" against South Africa, four years after being unable to watch England's World Cup final loss.
articles.title: 'It hit me what I was missing out on' - Care on World Cup

articles.description: Goalkeeper Sandy MacIver switches her allegiance from England and is included in Scotland's squad for their Nations League games later this month.
articles.title: MacIver in Scotland squad after switch from England

articles.description: The Netherlands' shock World Cup victory over South Africa will "make the front page" and is "iconic and memorable".
articles.title: 'Iconic' Netherlands shock will 'make the front page'

articles.description: Manchester City and England forward Chloe Kelly reveals her phone secrets to BBC Sport's Liam MacDevitt, including old photos, her messaging habits and the last note she wrote.
articles.title: Man City's Kelly feels the heat in Unlocked

articles.description: Czech Republic international Jakub Jankto talks to BBC Sport in one of his first interviews since coming out.
articles.title: Coming out means I can play without hiding - Jankto

articles.description: Manager Michael O'Neill says Northern Ireland supporters do not need re-educated as they understand the challenges faced by his injury-hit squad.
articles.title: 'O'Neill certain that fans understand altered NI narrative'

articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo will make his return from injury at this weekend's United States Grand Prix in Austin, Texas.
articles.title: Ricciardo to return from injury at US GP in Austin
